name: Create 1CRM leads from Wufoo form submissions
description: Every time a new form is submitted on Wufoo containing an email address, Make will automatically look that email up on Clearbit. If a result is returned it will look that lead up in 1CRM using the email address. If there is no result it will create a new lead. If Clearbit does not return a result the error handler will use the data from the form to create the lead.
